debates.showAs: Disability (Personalised Budgets) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Disability (Personalised Budgets) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Disability Act 2005 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú an Achta um Míchumas, 2005 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Protection of Children (Online Age Verification) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Protection of Children (Online Age Verification) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act, in the interest of child protection, to require that access to pornographic material on the internet be subject to an age-verification requirement and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht, ar mhaithe le cosaint leanaí, dá cheangal go mbeidh rochtain ar ábhar pornagrafach ar an idirlíon faoi réir ceanglas fíoraithe aoise agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Protection of Children (Online Age Verification) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chosaint Leanaí (Fíorú Aoise ar Líne), 2024

debates.showAs: Domestic Violence (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Domestic Violence (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Domestic Violence Act 2018 by means of extending the restrictions on those present in courtroom proceedings, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Fhoréigean Baile, 2018 trí na srianta a bheidh orthu siúd a bheidh i láthair in imeachtaí i seomra cúirte a leathnú, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Control of Dogs (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Control of Dogs (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Control of Dogs Act 1986, and for that purpose, to provide for dog control notices, to provide for notices relating to the exclusion of dogs from certain premises, to amend the Control of Dogs (Dog Licensing Database) Regulations 2019 so as to provide for the mandatory maintenance of a dog licensing database, to amend the Local Government Act 2001 to provide for public places where dogs can be off leash and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú an Achta um Rialú Madraí, 1986 agus, chun na críche sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le fógraí um rialú madraí, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le fógraí i ndáil le madraí a eisiamh ó áitribh áirithe, do leasú na Rialachán um Rialú Madraí (Bunachar Sonraí Ceadúnaithe Madraí), 2019 d’fhonn socrú a dhéanamh maidir le cothabháil shainordaitheach a dhéanamh ar bhunachar sonraí ceadúnaithe madraí, do leasú an Achta Rialtais Áitiúil, 2001 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le háiteanna poiblí inar féidir madraí a scaoileadh ón iall agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Rialú Madraí (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 2024

debates.showAs: Domestic Violence (Amendment) Bill 2024: Committee Stage
Domestic Violence (Amendment) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Domestic Violence (Amendment) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend section 33 of the Domestic Violence Act 2018 for the purpose of providing for an indictable offence under that section, to amend the Schedule to the Bail Act 1997 so as to include a reference to an offence under the said section 33, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú alt 33 den Acht um Fhoréigean Baile, 2018 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le cion indíotáilte faoin alt sin, do leasú an Sceidil a ghabhann leis an Acht um Bannaí, 1997 chun tagairt do chion faoin alt sin 33 a áireamh, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Horticultural Peat (Temporary Measures) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Horticultural Peat (Temporary Measures) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Acts 2000 to 2021 and the Environmental Protection Agency Acts 1992 to 2011 to make exceptional provision for peat extraction for the purpose of horticulture for a temporary period in the public interest in order to mitigate the adverse consequences resulting, or likely to result from an interruption to supply and to provide for a just transition.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na nAchtanna um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 go 2021 agus na nAchtanna fán nGníomhaireacht um Chaomhnú Comhshaoil, 1992 go 2011 chun socrú eisceachtúil a dhéanamh maidir le baint móna chun críche gairneoireachta ar feadh tréimhse shealadach ar mhaithe le leas an phobail d’fhonn maolú a dhéanamh ar na hiarmhairtí dochracha a bheidh, nó is dóigh a bheidh, mar thoradh ar bhriseadh ar sholáthar agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le trasdul cóir.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Móin Ghairneoireachta (Bearta Sealadacha), 2021

debates.showAs: Protection of the Native Irish Honey Bee Bill 2021: Report and Final Stages
Protection of the Native Irish Honey Bee Bill 2021: Committee Stage
Protection of the Native Irish Honey Bee Bill 2021: Second Stage
Protection of the Native Irish Honey Bee Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to ban the importation of non-native honey bees with the aim of reducing the threat to and adverse impact upon biodiversity and the ecosystem arising from the introgression/crossing/cross-breeding of the native Irish Honey Bee, Apis mellifera mellifera, due to the importation of non-native species or sub-species of and/or strains derived from Apis mellifera and to provide for the appointment of authorised officers; to make it an offence to forge an animal health certificate; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chur cosc le beacha nach beacha meala dúchasacha Éireannacha a allmhairiú, d’fhonn laghdú a dhéanamh ar an mbagairt, agus ar an drochthionchar, ar an mbithéagsúlacht agus ar an éiceachóras a eascraíonn as ionghabháil/crosáil/crosphórú na Beiche Meala dúchasaí Éireannaí, Apis mellifera mellifera, mar gheall ar allmhairiú speiceas neamhdhúchasach nó fospeiceas d’Apis mellifera agus/nó tréithchineálacha a dhíorthaíonn as Apis mellifera agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hoifigigh údaraithe a cheapadh; do dhéanamh cion de dheimhniú um shláinte ainmhí a bhrionnú; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Protection of the Native Irish Honey Bee Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an mBeach Mheala Dhúchasach Éireannach a Chosaint, 2021

debates.showAs: Safe Access to Termination of Pregnancy Services Bill 2021: Report and Final Stages
Safe Access to Termination of Pregnancy Services Bill 2021: Committee Stage
Safe Access to Termination of Pregnancy Services Bill 2021: Second Stage
Safe Access to Termination of Pregnancy Services Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to protect the free and unencumbered access to facilities providing legal termination of pregnancy services; protect individuals providing or facilitating legal termination of pregnancy services from harassment; and to provide for matters connected therewith.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun rochtain gan bhac gan chonstaic ar shaoráidí a sholáthraíonn seirbhísí foirceanta toirchis dlíthiúla a chosaint; chun daoine a sholáthraíonn nó a éascaíonn seirbhísí foirceanta toirchis dlíthiúla a chosaint ar chiapadh; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe a bhaineann leis an méid sin.
bill.shortTitleEn: Safe Access to Termination of Pregnancy Services Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Rochtain Shábháilte ar Sheirbhísí Foirceanta Toirchis, 2021

debates.showAs: Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person (Amendment) (Stalking) Bill 2021: Report and Final Stages
Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person (Amendment) (Stalking) Bill 2021: Committee Stage
Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person (Amendment) (Stalking) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person (Amendment) (Stalking) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for a specific offence of stalking characterised by repeated, unwanted behaviour that occurs as a result of fixation or obsession and causes alarm, distress or harm to the victim and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cion sonrach arb éard é stalcaireacht, arb é an phríomhthréith a ghabhann léi iompar gan iarraidh, arís agus arís eile, a tharlaíonn mar thoradh ar ghreamú nó dúghabháil, agus ar cúis é le scaoll a chur san íospartach, anó a chur air nó uirthi nó díobháil a dhéanamh dó nó di agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person (Amendment) (Stalking) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chionta Neamh-Mharfacha in aghaidh an Duine (Leasú) (Stalcaireacht), 2021

debates.showAs: Electoral (Amendment) (Voting at 16) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Electoral (Amendment) (Voting at 16) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to reduce to sixteen years the age at which a person is entitled to be registered as a European Parliament and local government elector, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do laghdú go dtí sé bliana déag an aois ag a mbeidh duine i dteideal a bheith cláraithe mar thoghthóir do Pharlaimint na hEorpa agus mar thoghthóir rialtais áitiúil, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
